author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
A few years back Google put stop to JPEG XL likely because it was directly competing with AVIF and now they've changed there mind and it's once again coming back after they couldn't stop it.

title: Google Finally Accepts JPEG XL Is The Future!!
